# Nginx Config

# Change default Site

In the config file change from this:

server {
    ...
    listen 80;
    listen [::]:80;
}

to this:

server {
    ...
    listen 80 default_server;
    listen [::]:80 default_server;
}

# Set Upload Size

server {
    ...
    client_max_body_size 100M;
}

# Static File Caching

server {
    ...
    location ~*  \.(jpg|jpeg|png|gif|ico|mp4)$ {
        expires 30d;
    }
}

WARNING

Don't cache js and css when using Fjord.
